A: 1. Jesus taught us to pray without _? (a) stopping (b) ceasing (c) thinking)
2. We should pray to God in _? (a) public (b) secret (c) church)
3. When praying, we should not get _? (a) discouraged (b) tired (c) bored)
4. We should pray in faith without _? (a) fear (b) doubt (c) talking)
5. Jesus taught us to pray for something _? (a) general (b) specific (c) big)
6. Jesus is the _ of God? (a) friend (b) son (c) prophet)
7. Jesus has power over all things on _? (a) earth (b) water (c) air)
8. Jesus demonstrated his power over natural _? (a) forces (b) animals (c) people)
9. Jesus calmed the _? (a) river (b) lake (c) sea)
10. When the storm happened, Jesus said 'Peace be _'? (a) quiet (b) still (c) calm)
11. Jesus walked on the _? (a) land (b) sea (c) mountain)
12. How many people followed Jesus to the mountain? (a) five hundred (b) five thousand (c) two thousand)
13. Jesus asked one of his _ how to get bread? (a) friends (b) disciples (c) family)
14. A boy had five loaves of bread and two small _? (a) chickens (b) fishes (c) eggs)
15. After everyone ate, how many baskets of leftovers were there? (a) ten (b) twelve (c) fifteen)
16. Peter's Mother-in-law was a person Jesus _? (a) taught (b) healed (c) met)
17. The paralysed man was a person Jesus _? (a) healed (b) visited (c) knew)
18. Jairus's Daughter was a person Jesus raised from the _? (a) sleep (b) dead (c) ground)
19. The widow's son was a person Jesus raised from the _? (a) dead (b) sick (c) bed)
20. Lazarus was a person Jesus raised from the _? (a) dead (b) prison (c) grave)
B: 1. What did Jesus have power over? _________
2. What did Jesus calm during a storm? _________
3. How many loaves did the boy have? _________
C: 1. What is one way Jesus taught us to pray?
2. What did Jesus say to the wind to calm the sea?
3. How many people did Jesus feed with five loaves and two fish?
5. Name one person Jesus raised from the dead.
